title: Kansas DEM Overlays Collection
description: A catalog of processed overlays derived from Kansas 1m DEMs and historical base layers. Includes hillshade, slope/aspect derivatives, and georeferenced historical topographic map overlays. All overlays are aligned to WGS84/UTM and documented with provenance metadata.

overlays.description: Hillshade overlay generated from 2018â€“2020 Kansas 1m DEM.
overlays.provenance: USGS 3DEP LiDAR, processed via GDAL hillshade pipeline

overlays.description: Georeferenced 1894 USGS topographic map of Larned, Kansas, used as historical overlay.
overlays.provenance: USGS Historical Topographic Map Collection, georeferenced to WGS84

data_quality.processing: All overlays converted to Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) with internal tiling and compression. Georeferencing RMS error < 10m for historical maps.
data_quality.uncertainty: Historical maps subject to cartographic distortions; modern DEM derivatives accurate within source LiDAR specifications.
